pluginDocs.title: README
pluginDocs.content:
# Product Q&A Plugin

Enable customer questions and answers on product pages.

## Features

- Ask questions about products
- Admin moderation queue
- Answer notification (via email hook)
- Helpful votes
- Pending/Approved/Rejected status

## Widget Configuration

| Setting | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| title | Section heading |
| allowAnonymous | Allow anonymous questions |
| requireEmail | Require email for notifications |
| showCount | Questions to display initially |

## API Endpoints

- `GET /questions` - Get approved questions for product
- `POST /questions` - Submit new question
- `GET /pending` - Get pending questions (admin)
- `POST /answer` - Answer a question
- `PUT /status` - Update question status
- `POST /helpful` - Mark as helpful

## Workflow

1. Customer asks question on product page
2. Question goes to pending queue
3. Admin reviews and answers
4. Answered question appears on product page
